metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7990 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Race condition in the rds_sendmsg function in net/rds/sendmsg.c in theLinux kernel before 4.3.3 allows local users to cause a denial of service(NULL pointer dereference and system crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact by using a socket that was not properly bound.  NOTE: thisvulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2015-6937.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7990` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.3.0-5-generic - 4.3.0-5.16
linux-image-4.3.0-5-generic-lpae - 4.3.0-5.16
linux-image-4.3.0-5-lowlatency - 4.3.0-5.16
linux-image-4.3.0-5-powerpc-e500mc - 4.3.0-5.16
linux-image-4.3.0-5-powerpc-smp - 4.3.0-5.16
linux-image-4.3.0-5-powerpc64-emb - 4.3.0-5.16
linux-image-4.3.0-5-powerpc64-smp - 4.3.0-5.16
linux-image-extra-4.3.0-5-generic - 4.3.0-5.16
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1003.4
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1012-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1012.12
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
No subscription required

linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic-lpae - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-lowlatency - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-5.16').
linux-raspi2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1003.4').
linux-snapdragon package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1012.12').
linux-aws package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1001.10').
linux-hwe package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1').
linux-gke package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1003.3').
